attributes.action: introduce more robust legislation within the PAT Testing industry to ensure better safety, competency and professionalism within the industry
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In the UK, there are more than 14 fatal injuries directly related to electricity in the workplace each year.

Yet currently there are no mandatory reporting standards governing the electrical safety testing industry, which makes it difficult for businesses to identify bogus or shoddy companies.
 
Regular Portable Appliance Testing (PAT) and Periodic Installation Testing by a qualified engineer ensures safety, however the current lack of regulation means tests can legally be carried out by unqualified staff.

More scrutiny would be more effective at improving safety within businesses throughout the UK.
